name: VyuHA
0:
”Alexa, Turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, Turn on movie scene”
”Alexa, Turn off bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: VyuHA is the smart appliance control skill. Users need to register using their VyuHA Smart Home credentials to enable the skill. On successful login, you need to discover the devices and scenes associated with your account. Once the devices and scenes get discovered you can control all the appliances and can also can apply the scenes you had created using the VyuHA App.
